game

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates the dice rolls and holds the count of rolls played in a game.
    Author:
    Adriano Kaito

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int MAX_NUMBER_ROLLS 
      private int rollCount 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dice() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getFace()
      Generates a random number between 1 and 6.
      boolean hasReachedMaxRolls()
      Checks if the game is over due to maximum rolls of the dice per game.
      void resetRollCount()
      Resets the roll count for a new game.
      int roll()
      Simulates rolls of two dices and updates the roll count.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dice

        public Dice()

    • Method Detail

      • getFace

        public int getFace()
        Generates a random number between 1 and 6.
        Returns:
        The value of the face

      • roll

        public int roll()
        Simulates rolls of two dices and updates the roll count.
        Returns:
        The sum of both faces of the dices

      • hasReachedMaxRolls

        public boolean hasReachedMaxRolls()
        Checks if the game is over due to maximum rolls of the dice per game.
        Returns:
        True if roll count reached the number defined in MAX_NUMBER_ROLLS

      • resetRollCount

        public void resetRollCount()
        Resets the roll count for a new game.
